item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting international Payments
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Outage during Scheduled Maintenance

One of our payments processing partners will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Sunday March 10th from 1:00 GMT to 4:00 AM GMT, during which Outgoing International Payments and transfers will fail. We apologize for any inconvenience and aim to minimize disruption. Summary:

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 01:00 - 04:00 GMT

Mar 4, 14:13 GMT
Scheduled - One of our payments processing partners will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Sunday March 10th from 1:00 GMT to 4:00 AM GMT. During this time window, Outgoing International Payments and transfers will fail.

We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause you and we aim to keep any disruption to a minimum.

item.title: Paysafe cash deposits in Ireland are not working
item.content:encoded:
High - Paysafe Cash Top-Up Processing Issues

Investigating partner service outage affecting Paysafe cash top-ups. Significant impact on processing transactions. Working to resolve the issue.

Feb 22, 08:49 GMT
Investigating - Because of a partner service outage, we’re experiencing issues in processing Paysafe cash top-ups.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Issue with PayPoint top-ups
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Cash top-up technical issue at PayPoint locations in the UK

We're experiencing a technical issue with one of our partners, affecting cash top-ups at PayPoint locations in the UK. We're investigating, and we'll update as soon as we know more.

Feb 20, 14:24 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 12, 10:14 GMT
Investigating - We're experiencing a technical issue with one of our partners, which is affecting cash top-ups at PayPoint locations in the UK. We're working with them to investigate this, and we'll update this page as soon as we know more.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting International Payments
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Maintenance in Progress Summary: Scheduled maintenance is currently underway, affecting outgoing international payments and transfers. Users may experience disruptions during the maintenance window.

Feb 11, 03:00 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 11, 01:00 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 1, 13:07 GMT
Scheduled - One of our payments processing partners will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Sunday February 11th from 1:00 GMT to 3:00 AM GMT. During this time window, Outgoing International Payments and transfers will fail.

We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause you and we aim to keep any disruption to a minimum.

item.title: Delay in SEPA Eur payments.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 10:10 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 8, 14:49 GMT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 8, 11:14 GMT
Investigating - We’re experiencing a delay in processing SEPA EUR Payments. Viewing Account balance might also be affected.
We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue.

item.title: EUR account creation maintenance.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 07:15 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 9, 06:15 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 8, 12:37 GMT
Scheduled - We'll be conducting system maintenance on our Account Service. Customers might encounter service disruption when creating an EUR account.

We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause you.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance causing 5 minute delay for payments
item.content:encoded:
Feb 7, 06:07 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 7, 06:00 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 6, 16:58 GMT
Scheduled - On 7th February 6:00 AM GMT, we will be performing a scheduled maintenance. Any payments made during this maintenance time will be held and completed after the maintenance is finished. Maintenance is expected to last for about 5 minutes.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: EUR account creation maintenance.
item.content:encoded:
Feb 6, 08:00 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 6, 06:00 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 5, 12:28 GMT
Scheduled - We'll be conducting system maintenance on our Account Service. Customers might encounter service disruption when creating an EUR account.

We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause you.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting payments
item.content:encoded:
Jan 23, 04:46 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 23, 04:00 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 18, 13:18 GMT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jan 18, 13:16 GMT
Scheduled - On 23 January 4:00-4:45 AM GMT we'll be performing a scheduled maintenance. Most of the payments made during the maintenance window will be queued and processed once the maintenance has been completed. Small amount of transactions might be cancelled.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: All outbound payments delayed
item.content:encoded:
Jan 4, 18:35 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved and all affected payments have been processed.

Jan 4, 17:48 GMT
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jan 4, 17:47 GMT
Update - A fix has been implemented, and affected payments are being processed. We are currently monitoring.

Jan 4, 17:46 GMT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 4, 16:50 GMT
Identified - We’re experiencing a delay in processing outbound payments at the moment. Monese card payments will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: International payments - delays are expected
item.content:encoded:
Jan 1, 08:56 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 22, 08:56 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 5, 09:48 GMT
Scheduled - Due to the holiday season, you may experience delays in processing some international payments and SEPA payments between the 24th of December and the 1st of January. You can still send payments during these times but you may experience a delay of 1-2 days of the funds arriving at the beneficiary. This is due to banks worldwide operating different opening hours over the holiday period.

UK Faster Payments, Monese to Monese Payments, and Monese card payments will still work as expected.

We thank you for your patience, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Monese to Monese & Faster payments delayed
item.content:encoded:
Dec 29, 16:33 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 29, 15:06 GMT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 29, 14:29 GMT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 29, 14:29 GMT
Investigating - We’re experiencing a delay on sending Monese to Monese & Faster payments at the moment.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Monese app unavailable on iOS & Android
item.content:encoded:
Dec 6, 11:30 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 6, 11:11 GMT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 6, 11:05 GMT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 5, 22:42 GMT
Investigating - It’s not possible to access the Monese app on some iOS and Android devices at the moment.
Card payments, cash withdrawals, and receiving inbound payments will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting inbound and outbound RON Payments
item.content:encoded:
Nov 11, 01:00 GMT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 10, 19:31 GMT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 10, 15:46 GMT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Nov 10, 15:45 GMT
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Nov 10, 12:19 GMT
Scheduled - From 10 November 8:30 PM GMT until 11 November 2:00 AM GMT we'll be performing scheduled maintenance. Any outbound RON payment made during this maintenance time will fail. Any inbound payment to your RON account will be queued and processed once the maintenance has been completed. Monese to Monese payments and card transactions will still work. We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: UK faster payments are delayed
item.content:encoded:
Nov 6, 09:27 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 4, 17:58 GMT
Identified - The issues has been identified and a fix has been implemented. The pending payments will be processed on Monday (6.10). Thank you for your patience.

Nov 4, 15:55 GMT
Investigating - We’re experiencing a problem with UK Faster Payments at the moment. Your payments might be delayed.

We thank you for your patience while they resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Local EUR payments are delayed
item.content:encoded:
Oct 31, 10:16 GMT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 31, 04:23 GMT
Investigating - Our partner has informed us that they are having some issues processing local EURO payments.
They are investigating; please notice that meantime Local EUR payments are delayed. The rest of services are working correctly.

item.title: Routine maintenance that affects contacting us
item.content:encoded:
Oct 26, 04:00 BST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 26, 03:01 BST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 23, 12:44 BST
Scheduled - While one of our technical partner makes some improvements, you might experience difficulties contacting Monese (26 Oct 2-3:00 AM GMT)

You will still be able to email us, but might have issues contacting via other channels.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Top-ups and outgoing payments affected
item.content:encoded:
Oct 16, 18:56 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 16, 15:15 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 16, 14:24 BST
Investigating - Because of an outage with our banking partner, we’re experiencing a problem with debit card top-ups and outgoing payments at the moment.

We thank you for your patience while they resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting inbound and outbound UK Faster Payments
item.content:encoded:
Oct 14, 09:16 BST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 14, 00:46 BST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 13, 17:53 BST
Scheduled - On this evening at 00:45 BST, our UK banking partner is performing scheduled maintenance. Any inbound and outbound UK Faster Payments made during this maintenance time will be held and completed after the maintenance is finished. Monese to Monese payments and card transactions will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and deeply apologise for the short notice. We’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Routine maintenance affecting Monese cards
item.content:encoded:
Oct 12, 05:00 BST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 12, 04:01 BST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 10, 12:12 BST
Scheduled - While we are making some technical improvements, using some of your Monese card features are affected (12 October 3:00 - 4:00AM GMT).

You will still be able to use your cards, but won’t be able to:
order new cards
review your card details in app
do a payment where 3-D Secure is required

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Outbound payments unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Oct 11, 07:43 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 10, 20:38 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 10, 18:50 BST
Investigating - We’re experiencing an issue in making outbound payments at the moment, affecting UK Faster Payments, Monese to Monese Payments, SEPA payments and International Payments. Inbound payments and Monese card payments will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Monese app unavailable on iOS
item.content:encoded:
Oct 9, 13:25 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 9, 13:19 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 9, 13:05 BST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 9, 12:03 BST
Investigating - It’s not possible to access the Monese app on iOS devices at the moment. Card payments, cash withdrawals and receiving inbound payments will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Adding new payees for SEPA payments temporarily unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Oct 1, 19:07 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 1, 18:40 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Oct 1, 18:36 BST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 1, 17:40 BST
Investigating - We’re experiencing minor technical issues with our IBAN validation partner, which means it’s not possible to add new payees for SEPA payments at the moment. Payments to existing payees will still work.


We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Monese app temporarily unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Sep 29, 15:57 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 29, 15:38 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 29, 15:15 BST
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Sep 29, 15:13 BST
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Sep 29, 14:57 BST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 29, 13:53 BST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 29, 13:49 BST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 29, 13:09 BST
Investigating - We’re experiencing an issue with accessing the Monese app, creating a new account and making outbound payments. Card payments, cash top ups, cash withdrawals and incoming payments will still work.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Scheduled maintenance affecting outbound International Payments
item.content:encoded:
Sep 23, 11:00 BST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 23, 10:01 BST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 17, 15:36 BST
Scheduled - On 23 September 09:00 - 10:00 GMT, one of our partners is performing scheduled maintenance. Any outbound international payments made during this time will fail.

Local payments, Monese to Monese payments and card transactions will still work.

We thank you for your patience while the maintenance is performed and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Routine maintenance affecting app access
item.content:encoded:
Sep 21, 05:00 BST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 21, 04:00 BST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 14, 13:02 BST
Scheduled - While our technical team is making some improvements, you won’t be able to use your Monese app on 21 September 03:00 GMT until 04:00.

You might be able to use your cards, but won’t be able to send or receive payments between these times. Any payments sent to your Monese account will be processed straight after but some may be declined.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.

item.title: Monese app degraded
item.content:encoded:
Sep 1, 12:30 BST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 1, 11:57 BST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 1, 11:15 BST
Identified - It may not be possible to access the Monese app on some devices at the moment.

We thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue, and we’ll update this page as soon as we can.
